item.title: Simple HelpDesk[PI]
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

A tutorial would be something that helps me create some massive end-game content. It would generally lead me in a direction in which I can span my own ideas off of. This ‘tutorial’ is just taking someone else’s idea, shoving it into my source code and calling it a day.

There really should be a thread for “server ideas” where players can just shove their snippit-ish codes there.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple HelpDesk[PI]
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

This can be done in a matter of minutes, just for the noobs! 


	if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("help")) {
				c.getPA().movePlayer(2473, 4956, 0);
				c.sendMessage("<col=16711680>Please wait for a member of staff to assist you.");
				for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
					if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
						Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
						if(Connection.isMuted(c)){
							c.sendMessage("You can't ask for help when you are muted.");
							return;
						}
						if (c.Jail == true) {
							c.sendMessage("You can't ask for help in jail.");
							return;
						}
						if (PlayerHandler.players[j].playerRights > 0 && PlayerHandler.players[j].playerRights < 4 )
							c2.sendMessage("[HELP DESK] <shad=15536940>"+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"</shad> IS AT THE HELP DESK USE ::DESK");
			
							
						
					}
				}
			}

Add that into your player commands.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("desk") && c.playerRights >= 1) {
				c.sendMessage("<img=1><img=2> Go help some players. <img=1><img=2>");
				c.getPA().movePlayer(2480, 4956, 0);
			}

Add that into your moderator commands.

Now, to ensure it’s not a snippet: Explaining! 

c.getPA().movePlayer(2473, 4956, 0);
				c.sendMessage("<col=16711680>Please wait for a member of staff to assist you.");

This teleports the player to the desk, and sends them a colorful message XD. You can add a timer if you want.

if (PlayerHandler.players[j].playerRights > 0 && PlayerHandler.players[j].playerRights < 4 )
							c2.sendMessage("[HELP DESK] <shad=15536940>"+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"</shad> IS AT THE HELP DESK USE ::DESK");

That means that Mods, Admins and Owners all get the help alert, but no one else.

Its pretty self explanatory, I’ll probably update it with objects soon!

Read full topic
